policies.exclusions: Death due to illegal activities or suicide within the first two years

policies.coverage: Property damage: 200000 (fire, theft, vandalism), Liability: 100000, Additional Structures: 50000

faqs.question: Are pre-existing conditions covered?
faqs.answer: Pre-existing conditions are covered after 12 months of continuous coverage.

faqs.question: What is the maximum annual payout for my policy?
Are prescription drugs covered?
faqs.answer: Yes, prescription drugs are covered up to 80% after the deductible.

faqs.question: What does my auto insurance cover?
faqs.answer: It covers collision, comprehensive damage, and personal injury.

faqs.question: How can I file a claim?
faqs.answer: You can file a claim via our mobile app or website.

faqs.question: Is theft covered by my auto insurance?
faqs.answer: Yes, theft is covered under comprehensive coverage.

faqs.question: Can I increase my life insurance coverage?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can increase coverage by contacting customer service.

faqs.question: Can I change my beneficiary?
faqs.answer: Yes, beneficiaries can be updated anytime.

faqs.question: What happens if I miss a premium payment?
faqs.answer: You have a 30-day grace period to make the payment.

faqs.question: Does my home insurance cover fire damage?
faqs.answer: Yes, fire damage is covered up to $200,000.

faqs.question: Is flood damage covered?
faqs.answer: No, flood damage is excluded from your policy.

faqs.question: Is my roof covered under my home insurance?
faqs.answer: Yes, roof damage is covered under property damage.
